source: TEXT_COMDEFSANCTION_00086_FLAMEMAGE_001<tab>I am the official charged with the bestowal of sanction upon our members. As you are not one of us, I am afraid you cannot avail yourself of these services.
target: TEXT_COMDEFSANCTION_00086_FLAMEMAGE_001<tab>自分は、<var 09 E802 ((グランドカンパニー「黒渦団」)) ((グランドカンパニー「双蛇党」)) ((グランドカンパニー「不滅隊」)) /var>の魔法工兵であります！

source: TEXT_COMDEFSANCTION_00086_FLAMEMAGE_006<tab>I am the official charged with the bestowal of sanction status upon those of the rank of <var 09 E802 ((chief storm sergeant)) ((chief serpent sergeant)) ((chief flame sergeant)) /var> or above. How might I serve you this day?
target:
TEXT_COMDEFSANCTION_00086_FLAMEMAGE_006自分は、の魔法工兵であります！
以上の階級の方に、「サンクション」を付与しております！

source: TEXT_COMDEFSANCTION_00086_FLAMEMAGE_011<tab>Heed me, O Sagacious Builder! Grant Thee Thy divine favor unto this Thy faithful servant!
target:
TEXT_COMDEFSANCTION_00086_FLAMEMAGE_011大いなる工神ビエルゴよ……
)) (()) (()) /var>殿に、
加護を授けたまえ……

source: TEXT_COMDEFSANCTION_00086_FLAMEMAGE_012<tab>It is done─the sanction of our organization is now bestowed upon you. I pray for your every success in the field.
target:
TEXT_COMDEFSANCTION_00086_FLAMEMAGE_012これにて、「サンクション」の付与は完了であります！
)) (()) (()) /var>殿のご武運を、
お祈り申し上げます！

source: TEXT_COMDEFSANCTION_00086_FLAMEMAGE_016<tab>In a bid to outfit our men and women in superior equipment, the foremost minds of <var 09 E802 ((the Maelstrom)) ((the Order of the Twin Adder)) ((the Immortal Flames)) /var> and the Eorzean Alliance have come together to develop an advanced method of gear enhancement.
target:
TEXT_COMDEFSANCTION_00086_FLAMEMAGE_016サンクションとは、が
「エオルゼア都市軍事同盟」の加盟都市と
共同で開発した装備強化術です。

source: TEXT_COMDEFSANCTION_00086_FLAMEMAGE_017<tab>The result is “sanction,” a process which involves the casting of any one of a range of enhancing spells on gear specially crafted to harbor enchantments.
target:
TEXT_COMDEFSANCTION_00086_FLAMEMAGE_017製造段階で「特殊な魔法加工」を施した武具に対し、
強化魔法の一種を付与します。すると、一時的に
その強度や性質を高めることができます。

source: TEXT_COMDEFSANCTION_00086_FLAMEMAGE_018<tab>The <var 09 E802 ((Maelstrom has)) ((Order of the Twin Adder has)) ((Immortal Flames have)) /var> recently devoted additional resources to the manufacturing of such arms and armor. Sanction-ready items are available to those of the rank of <var 09 E802 ((chief storm sergeant)) ((chief serpent sergeant)) ((chief flame sergeant)) /var> or above in exchange for company seals.
target:
TEXT_COMDEFSANCTION_00086_FLAMEMAGE_018我らがでは、対象となる装備の増産を進めております。
「」以上の階級の方なら、軍票と引き替えに
装備の支給を受けられますよ。
